nonlethal: The missile trembles in ﬂight, eagerly anticipating the feast of carnage to come...
lethal: ...in the aftermath of the attack, the only motion is the trembling of your shot as it stands victorious upon the corpse of your enemy.

nonlethal: A masterfully-controlled shot arcs through the air, striking true...
lethal: When you release your shot your breathing is controlled, balanced, and predictable, your opponent’s death however is none of these...

nonlethal: The missile screams through the air with a keening whine and slams into the target...
lethal: ...the missile’s screaming ﬂight is interrupted as it connects with its target, and both collapse in a deadly embrace.

nonlethal: A skillfully placed shot rakes across your enemy...
lethal: You ensure your shot will evade other barriers before skillfully releasing death onto your enemy.

nonlethal: You echo the form of a master marksman, then deliver your shot with accuracy...
lethal: ...your shot was so perfectly administered, it echoes in the ears of the God of war.

nonlethal: Your shot zips past your foe, leaving a straight staining mark...
lethal: ...the projectile goes zipping across your foe with ruinous force, leaving them a hollow, defeated shell.

nonlethal: Your shot connects with an impressive thwacking sound...
lethal: ...your shot lands with a wet thwack, a sound only the god of death could love.

nonlethal: Te blade glints wickedly as it arcs to meet its victim...
lethal: ...the blade tears across them, leaving a wicked wound in its wake from which they cannot hope to recover.

nonlethal: With a deft touch, you send a spinning shot whirling into your foe...
lethal: ...you deftly avoid obstacles as your shot stills your foe.

nonlethal: A soft whir of sound precedes a grisly thwack, as your shot slams home...
lethal: ...your shot parts the air with a sensual whir, before ending your enemy’s existence with a savage, tearing whack.

nonlethal: With a malevolent glimmer, your shot displays a perfect arc on the way to its target...
lethal: ...the enemy tries desperately to evade your missile, but as it slams home it extinguishes their last glimmer of hope.

nonlethal: Your shot lands, and cleverly intervenes with your opponent’s ill intentions...
lethal: ...the loosed weapon intervenes between two of the target’s vitals, severing their ability to stay alive.

nonlethal: Your shot ricochets oﬀ your foe leaving a jagged and unclean wound...
lethal: ...fearless in the face of an improbable shot, you watch your well-placed ricochet end your target’s life.

nonlethal: Your shot ﬂies straight and true, striking your foe before they even realized it was on its way...
lethal: ...you let ﬂy your missile, and it carries your deadly intent unerringly to your foe.
